text: Pas, cun mohhoi harom sipari sud, musrikonro har kuco jofted, ʙikused va ononro dastgir kuned va dar muhosira ʙiguzored va dar har guzargohe ʙa kamini onon ʙinisined.Pas, agar tavʙa kardand va namoz ʙarpo dostand va zakot pardoxtand, rahojason kuned, [caro ki] ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo omurzandai mehruʙon ast
